show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #36 Hobbs Magaret "Carbon is the Currency of the Ecosystem"
subtitle: #36 Hobbs Magaret "Carbon is the Currency of the Ecosystem"
summary:
Hobbs Magaret is the guest this week, we talk about why it's so hard to get people to convert to regenerative practices and his upcoming move to East Texas.
We get deep down into the weeds on carbon, fake meat and government regulations.
We also unpack his controversial viewpoint about collapse ranching.
